about.description: I'm a frontend developer passionate about creating fast, elegant and functional interfaces. I love transforming ideas into smooth digital experiences, taking care of every detail from performance to accessibility. I enjoy working with React, TypeScript and modern architectures. I've developed projects that integrate design, business logic and a clean and intuitive user experience.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: Hello! These are the companies I've worked with and the most important technologies I used there.
